---
title: "Sync Teams/SharePoint Folder"
output: html_document
---

1. Open Teams
2. Navigate into the folder where the journal logs are stored
3. At the top of the folder window, select “Open in SharePoint.” A SharePoint tab will open in your default browser.
4. On the SharePoint site, click the “Sync” button located on the toolbar
5. A pop-up window will appear informing that the library will sync with your device for easy access.” Select “Sync now.”
6. A pop-up window will appear asking “Open Microsoft OneDrive?” Select “Open Microsoft OneDrive.
